author: Al Jazeera
title: US Democrats outline 'phase 4' of virus response
description: House Speaker Pelosi wants to move forward with an infrastructure bill when Congress returns to work after April 20.
content:
US House leader wants to move forward with an infrastructure bill when Congress returns to work after April 20.
Top Democrats in the United States House of Representatives said on Wednesday that they intend to advance an enhanced $760bn infrastructure plan a… [+2298 chars]
